channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 29 inch pothole outside 7 Albany Road, 20th June
item.description:
Pothole in the middle of the road, outside 7 Albany Road. Has been growing for several months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Albany Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingstone Avenue, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Overgrown vegetation obstructing footpath, 19th June
item.description:
The footpath from Shipton Crossroads (A40) down to the Frogmill Bus Stop (A436) is overgrown with long grass and nettles posing a risk to all users. The narrow path forces all users to step into the road to navigate past the grass and nettles endangering their safety.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2x 6 inch holes and sunken tarmac around manhole cover, 19th June
item.description:
Outside number 106 station road. Current problem a few weeks. I think Severn Trent had a look at it when there was a problem further down the road and road was closed. There has been a problem with this manhole for years. It floods when there is heavy rain probably because the drain is blocked or collapsed further down the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97,99, Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Mirror missing on street lamp, 19th June
item.description:
The mirror that was on the street lamp directly opposite to Naunton Park Road has been missing for about 5 months at least, it is a big issue for the cars turning out of Naunton Park Road as the ability to see oncoming traffic is nothing until you are already in the middle of the road. There could be an accident here as people come flying down Naunton Lane not realising that the traffic coming out of Naunton Park Road can't see them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kew Place, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass is covering walkways unclear verge edges, 19th June
item.description:
Harpfield Road and all around the area I notice Tewkesbury grass is very neatly cut regularly Itâ€™s been 3 years since this was cut Why do u only cut the larger grass areas?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harpfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerbstone damaged on The Green triangle under tree, 19th June
item.description:
Badly damaged kerb stone. There is a tree on a triangular green at the junction of The Green and Stockwell Lane Woodmancote. On this triangle is a broken kerb.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Tewkesbury

item.title: Faded road lining on Zoons Court roundabout., 19th June
item.description:
Very badly faded lines around the roundabout making it hard for road users to know which lane to get in when using the roundabout. This is a hazard and they need refreshing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
